Issachar "Izzy" Ivanoff aka Mr. Marvel- A Hebrew American young man who gained his superpowers after being exposed to Iso-8 during a camping trip. His powers include: invisiblity, force field projection, flight, super strength, and a healing ability he has no control over. Issachar or Izzy as his peers call him has a learning disability, but is a hardworking college student. Due to his autism he has a hard time trusting others, but his close friends understand his struggles who just happen to be new superheroes like himself. Despite his social awkwardness Izzy is an outgoing Messianic Jew who is dedicated to helping those in need regardless of who they are. 14113111.content:
It was another peaceful day in Oveido, the town where Mr.Marvel lives. Izzy was currently enjoying his summer. He thought about taking classes, but decided against it since he barely had a social life due to studying and saving the city of Orlando or at least the area area where his college was located. Izzy was currently working on a book he wanted to publish. It was a fanfic featuring himself alongside the Avengers. Yet he didn't want to move to New York. If he could start an Avengers-like team here in Orlando it would give him a chance to make more friends than he already has.

Yet making friends is easier said than done. Whenever he meets a new person he constantly doubts if they can be trusted. It took a year for him to trust Cyberneta, a Irish American superheroine who is consequently the twin sister to the new Arcade.

"I wonder if I should take a break? It's been awfully slow today."

Mr. Marvel decides to patrol the area. Upon patrolling Mr. Marvel notices a womanclutching her head. One moment later she morphs into an indistinguishable monster.

"What the heck did I just see?"

"Wa ha ha ha ha ha! It worked! My new monster potion worked!"

Mr. Marvel sees that the supervillain Witcher is up to using people as his guinea pigs again. Mr. Marvel can't just attack the monster. She was a human a few moments ago, yet if he didn't contain her she would murder countless people. Mr. Marvel turns invisible and attempts to attack Witcher head on. Unfortunately the monster's enhanced smell caused her to charge at him. Mr. Marvel quickly creates a forcefield to trap the monster, but by doing so he lost the element of surprise.

"If it isn't Mr. Marvel. How rude of you to disrupt my experiment again."

"Turning people into monsters is unethical!"

"Who cares what you say. You are a mutant after all."

"I'm not a mutant!"

"I would argue the opposite, Mr. Ivanoff. I tested your blood and found that you do have an active X-gene."

"Ivanoff? How do you know that surname isn't fake? Wouldn't I be considered a mutate if I touched Iso-8 to get my powers?"

"Stop avoiding the obvious boy. According to the newest book on heroes and villains Iso-8 only brings forth an individual's untapped potential. It's possible that touching the Iso-8 caused you to experience extreme..."

Mr. Marvel punches Witcher.

"You talk too much."

Witcher flips in the air and lands on his feet.

"Good thing those dance lessons I took as a child paid off. Now if you won't listen to logic I'll have to poison you."

Witcher pulls out a strange looking gun.

"This gun contains enough Terrigen mist to give you a bad dose of M-Pox. Your kind is already sterile due to the mists presence. Now to get rid..."

A bystander tackles Witcher and crushes the T-Gun which unleashes Terrigen into the air. Out of uncertainty Mr. Marvel quickly flies out of the mists range and creates a forcefield around himself.

If Witcher's right than I have to ensure that I don't die of M-Pox. Things are already tough when Miley M. Margret spreads her hate speech against anyone with superpowers and thanks to Captain Marvel using an Inhuman who turned evil to judge people before they committed crimes, she especially hates me, yet I feel sorry for Ms. Marvel though{. It isn't easy being a legacy hero, especially if the hero they look up to gets corrupted by an Inhuman who claims to see into the future./i}

After the mists cleared Mr. Marvel noticed two cocoons. Who knew that Witcher and that random guy or girl were Inhumans. Unfortunately the monster began attacking the cocoon of the bystander.

"That ain't good."

Mr. Marvel quickly charges at the monster and knocks her unconcious.

"Sorry about that, but I swear I'll find someone to cure you soon."

141132.content:
How about this team?

The Marvelous 4: A team of four superheroes with different origins band together to fight crime in the city of Orlando. Originally forming the concept after the Fantastic Four's disbandment these heroes are brought together by fate as a mad scientist starts creating synthetic humans with superpowers.

Mr. Marvel: Leader of the Marvelous 4. A Jewish American teenager who has autism. He's smart, but lacks any social skills. He's a Messianic Jew who wants to make a difference. One night he found a chunk of Iso-8 in his yard. Upon touching it he gained superpowers. Mr. Marvel can fly, has super strength, and can turn himself invisible and create invisible force fields. His real name is Benjamin Levi. Age 17 and is a college student. Has green eyes, black hair, 5'10" and his suit is red white and blue with white as the main color, blue highlights and a red star on his chest.

Cyberneta: The tech expert of the Marvelous 4. A young rich genius playgirl who flirts with most guys at her school. She spent months creating her nanoarmor suit. She tends to butt heads with Mr. Marvel due to his Creationist beliefs, but she's pretty reliable in any situation. A super fan of Tony Stark, she dedicates her time trying to surpass her idol in technological advances. She's a French American named Samantha Blanc. She has brown eyes, blonde hair, and stands at 5'8". Her nanotech suit is blue and silver. She has a crush on fellow Marvelous 4 member Beowulf. She is 18 and is currently working on her Bachelor's degree at UCF.

Beowulf: A mysterious young man who appeared out of nowhere. Nothing is known about him except that he calls himself Seth Logan as his "real name". Typically a loner he often spends his time working out at the gym on campus. Exceptionally smart for a young man his age. He has animal senses and three retractable claws on each hand that can be fired as projectiles. His healing factor allows him to literally regrow lost limbs. Has black hair with his bangs styled into a fork and blue eyes. His hair also has red highlights that appear to be part of his natural hair color giving him two different hair colors. He is roughly 18 or so. Has a crush on Ilusiana. He's the shortest member standing at 5'6".

Ilusiana: A Cuban Inhuman who has no idea what an Inhuman is. She is usually soft spoken and compassionate. She has psychic abilities, unfortunately she keeps seeing a disturbing vision of herself dying or turning "wicked". Her name is Catalina Florarosa. She has a mutual attraction to Beowulf, but is too shy to say her true feelings. She has brown hair, grey eyes and stands at 6'2".

1411321.content:
It was two years after the Secret Wars that the Marvelous 4 first came together. At first they were just individuals who fought crime alone, but Mr. Marvel, despite being a typical introvert decided that banding a team of fellow heroes might be more effective when fighting crime.

The first member he recruited was Cyberneta, who basically gave him the idea after briefly flirting with him. It didn't take long for the duo to find Ilusiana who is just as shy as Mr. Marvel himself. Then their last member, Beowulf, was found unconscious without any memory of his past except that he woke up in a lab without clothes on. Yet before escaping he stole a green and black suit that fit him perfectly.

When Cyberneta asked him if he had a place to stay, he replied by saying no. Now being the attention seeking playgirl that she is, Cyberneta was quick to offer Seth a room in her house. They have only joined up three days ago, but they answered a call for help when a mad scientist unleashed some superhumans in Downtown Orlando.

"Marvel! There's two superhumans up ahead!"

"Thanks for the heads up Cyberneta!"

Mr. Marvel charges ahead to take down the superhumans. The superhumans are a man and a woman. The man had dark skin and white hair. He wore a mask that covered his face. The mask was black and white and had red lenses built into it.

The woman wore a blue dress and had a staff in her left hand. Her blonde hair was tied into a bun and her eyes glowed purple.

"Yaaaa!"

The man and woman dodge Mr. Marvel's attack.

"Dang it."

"Give it up already. Hand us Madam Vile's son or we'll desecrate this city." The woman threatened as she readied a ball of energy.

"Never! A sick twisted woman like that is not my mother! I make my own decisions, for I am the best at what I do!" Beowulf yelled as he launched his claws at the woman.

Beowulf's claws hit the woman I'm her shoulder. Beowulf's claws start growing back.

"No! Energena!" The man cried as he rushed at Beowulf.

Mr. Marvel puts up an invisible forcefield. The man crashes into the invisible wall before him. Cyberneta then launches her tranquilizer nanobots. Once paralyzed, Ilusiana uses her psychic powers to persuade the superhumans to turn themselves in.

"We did it. We caught the bad guys." Ilusiana said as she let out a sigh.

"The Marvelous 4 saves the day again and it's all over the Internet!"

"We only just fought off the goons. Madam Vile won't give up easily. If I woke up in a lab without my memories then we can assume I wasn't the only one subjugated to her experiments."

"So she's not your Mom?"

"Don't tell me you believe those lackeys, Ben."

"I'm not sure Seth Logan, but there are supervillians who experiment on their children."

"What are you getting at Samanta?"

"My dear friend Catalina, I am simply saying that maybe we should test Wulfy's blood and see if he is related to Madam Vile."

"Is that another one of your hair brained schemes of flirting with me playgirl. Every week you date at least seven guys."

"I wouldn't have to date seven guys a week if you would stop playing hard to get, Logan. But, this isn't a request for a date despite how awesome that would be. If you want to know your past then I need a blood sample."

Beowulf growls at Cyberneta. "Fine, but if you try anything dangerous such as creating clones of me I will show you no mercy!"

"Um... Guys? I think we got other issues right now?" Mr. Marvel said as...
1411321.title: Introducing the Marvelous 4

choices: Using my psychic abilities to put him to sleep
Having you talk to him. You can talk to animals, right?
14113212.content:
"Um...Guys? I think we got other issues right now. " Mr. Marvel said as an explosion occurred in an apartment.

"What are we waiting for! My best friend lives there!" Cyberneta yelled as she used her jet boots to rush to the scene.

Once at the scene the Marvelous 4 see the residents evacuate from the apartment. A woman of Hatian and Japanese descent is seen talking with Cyberneta.

"Kim, what happened?"

"One of my experiments went awry. I tried using my alchemy to create a new creature. It worked but the chimera went beserk."

A roar is heard from the inside. What appears to be a three headed canine with wolf, dog, and fox DNA as its base starts spewing fire out of all three of its mouths.

"What is that thing?" Mr. Marvel asked.

"It's supposed to be a new breed of Cerberus by the looks of it." Cyberneta commented.

"The poor thing looks frightened. Maybe we should try to talk to him." Ilusiana said.

"We can't take any chances! We have to stop it no matter what."

"No Beo, we can't do that. Attacking him head on will only put the city in more danger."

"What's your plan Catalina?" Mr. Marvel asked Ilusiana.

"You're trying to debate what to do while that Cerberus-esque Chimera goes rampaging? Let's just destroy it."

Cyberneta and Beowulf rush at the chimera. Unfortunately the chimera swipes at them with his claws."

"Aack! My nanosuit is damaged and poor Wulfy got hurt!"

"I'm fine Cyberneta and don't call me Wulfy. The name is Beowulf. My wounds are already healed. My healing factor allows me to regenerate limbs and organs if I need to. Ilusiana what was that plan you and our leader were about to discuss?

"I'm glad you asked Seth. My plan involves...
14113212.title: Alchemy gone Wrong!

141132121.content:
"I'm glad you asked Seth. My plan involves using my psychic abilities to put him to sleep. The poor chimera is only a mere puppy that needs to be put to bed."

Beowulf looks at Ilusiana trying to deduce her logic. He think nods in agreement. "I may not see how that thing could be considered a puppy, but it's worth a shot."

"Thanks for the reassurance Beowulf." Ilusiana said as she started blushing.

Cyberneta starts seething with jealousy as she sees what to be an attraction between Beowulf and Ilusiana.

Just put him to sleep so Alchema can put him in his cage."

Ilusiana nods in agreement. She slowly approaches the rampaging chimera. The chimera roars upon seeing her.

"Now, now. Don't fuss. Your just a frightened pup who needs to sleep. Listen to my voice and sleep."

The Cerberus-chimera yawns as it listens to Ilusiana's hypnotic suggestion. The chimera then collapses from exhaustion. Mr. Marvel uses an invisible barrier to contain the chimera. Alchema, aka Kimberly Namia uses her alchemy to restore the apartment. She then walks toward Ilusiana.

"Thank you for your help. Hopefully I can keep this little guy under control."

"For such a small thing it managed to cause a lot of destruction. Hopefully this escalate to where the Avengers had to step in."

"That would have been embarassing. Thank you Samantha. Your friends definitely helped me out of that bind."

"Um... It was no problem." Mr. Marvel said.

"Anyone else hungry? I could use a burger." Beowulf said.

"Sure it's roughly lunch time. Want to join Kim. My android maid makes a good burger."

" I would but I can't leave this chimera unattended. Maybe next time Sam."

"No problem. I'm sure you can stop over next time."

The Marvelous 4 head back their HQ. Little did they know that Madam Vile was watching them from afar.

"If I can collect their blood samples and synthethize it I can create more artificial humans. I may even clone the originals. Yet I'm disappointed that my creation refused to return to me. I combined my DNA with that of the original Wolverine, the man who is long dead and was once a lover."

Madam Vile walks over to an incubator and a vial containing the original Wolverine's blood.

"Maybe it may be time to rekindle the flames from over a hundred years ago. I'll create a clone that is better than the original. I'll make him into the man I loved before I died and came back to life. Perhaps all Beowulf needs is a father. Good thing I bought this off of Deadpool. Humanity as it stands must change for the better."

Madam Vile prepares her plans for project Captain X.
141132121.title: To put a Cerberus Chimera to Sleep

They arrive early and they spot a short man fighting against Madam Vile's minion
1411321212.content:
After enjoying a few burgers with his teammates and enjoying a nice swim in thew HQ's pool Beowulf retires for the night.

"That was some strange day. Damn, but that doesn't help me remember who I was or who my actual parents are. I hope Samantha's theory about Madam Vile being my mother is wrong. Madam Vile has this creepy way of acting motherly just to manipulate others to do her dirty work. I remember while I was on the run she would always send her goons after me. Might as well get some rest. I want to head to UCF tomorrow to get in a good workout."

Beowulf falls asleep. While Beowulf was sleeping Cyberneta has Annie, the android maid, run Beowulf's blood sample to see if she could figure out who Beowulf's parents are. After falling asleep Beowulf has a strange dream. In the dream he was at a school of some kind. He saw various teenagers there and a gentleman in a wheelchair.

What's up with this school and why is it so familiar? I think I've heard Cyberneta mention this place. This is the X-Mansion and that man is Charles Xiaver. Could I have gone here in the past? Who's that woman with Red hair and why am I approaching them?

"Greetings Logan. We just had some new students arrive." The woman said.

"Is that so? Things aren't getting better out there. Magneto's got something big planned and it ain't good. To make matters worse the government has sent more Sentinels to hunt us down."

Why do I sound ten years or so older. No, I don't think that's me, but why does this man have my name? Could he be my father?

Beowulf's dream jumps to a wasteland. A tall man with blonde hair and adamantium claws charges at him.

"This is the end Wolverine!"

"I don't think so bub."

The man and Beowulf/Wolverine clash. The sudden clash in the dream woke Beowulf from his sleep. It was eight in the morning.

"What the heck was that dream about. I remember the dream perfectly, but who was that man? His name was Logan, but that's my surname or I believe it is. Seth is the name that I gave myself after I met a woman who was also called Wolverine. Yet I didn't use my powers at the time. We sort of just passed each other. Could that woman be a sister or cousin? There's so many questions and yet I'm really confused. I'll figure this out."

Beowulf hears a knock on his door.

"Seth Logan. I have news. I figured out who your father was, but your mother's medical DNA isn't found anywhere. I found out who your father was, but I had to covertly hack into S.H.E.I.L.D. to do it. Who knew you were related to an Avenger, unfortunately your dad's no longer living unless you count the old man with the X-Men who I'm certain is from another universe. Yet I knew all along."

"Can you tell me his name?"

"Oh Wulfy, why would I do that. You can check the Avengers' database or if you go out with me I may be willing to share the name."

Beowulf growls at Cyberneta.

"Stop blackmailing me bub. Just because you post everything you do on the net and are a walking money magnet doesn't give you the right to do that!"

Cyberneta gasped as the man she was head over heels rebuked her.

"Be that way Mr. Howlett. Your real surname is the only thing I'm giving you. Hurry up and get dressed. Madam Vile has been spotted with some more of those people. If were lucky we can beat that Creationist leader of ours along with Ilusiana to the crime scene."

Seth quickly suits up and scarfs down a protein bar before heading out to the crime scene. Beowulf and Cyberneta arrive at the scene and see...
1411321212.title: Dreams of a Past That he Never Had

choices: Two of Madam Vile's creations attack
14113212121.content:
Seth quickly suits up and scarfs down a protein bar before heading out to the crime scene. Beowulf and Cyberneta arrive at the scene and see Mr. Marvel and Ilusiana fighting along the Solstone. The Solstone is a young man who is half Spanish and half German. He obtained his powers when his assistant accidentally turned on the new trans-dimensional transporter. His molecules were rearranged that he is neither alive or dead, but a mere phantom who can change between human form and a ghostly form. The person they were fighting was a redheaded woman dressed in a mad scientist costume.

"It's Madam Vile! Let's put an end to her reign of terror once and for all!" Beowulf yelled as he readied his claws.

"What's this? Why it's my darling son. Return to me..." Beowulf stabs Madam Vile in the chest before she could finish speaking.

"Not cool dude! Since when did we start killing the bad guys!" Mr. Marvel rebuked Beowulf.

"I did it to stop that monster from experimenting on more innocent lives, bub."

Illusiana approaches Madam Vile, but quickly takes a step back.

"Beowulf's right! Her wounds are already healed!"

"Could she already be among the undead? But she looks very much alive?" Solstone pondered.

"The only person that could heal like that is Deadpool. Just saying that pervert's name gives me the creeps. Yet Beowulf's healing factor almost matches Deadpool's. Yet I believe Alchema mentioned one time that since the founding of alchemy that alchemists have attempted to recreate humans. I believe the term is homunculus."

"So you figured out that I'm not human. No matter, I will collect your DNA and create a better world. Humanity is at the brink of ruin. It's time for humanity to evolve. No powerless humans. Humanity in all forms is a stain on the world. By creating synthetic humans much of the world's problems can be solved."

"What!? That doesn't make sense and it's hypocritical! No man or woman has the right to wipe out mankind and replace them clones!" Mr. Marvel replied.

"Foolish boy I don't intend to make many clones. I'm talking about combining DNA from different people and giving them powers. These new generation homunculi are my children. I tried living a peaceful life when I was still human, but life is too cruel. I have then moved on and forgave my lover. Without him killing me I wouldn't have become what I am now."

"I didn't quite get that, but it sounds like you're using a twisted excuse to justify illegal genetic manipulation on humans." Cyberneta replied.

"I don't have time to argue with naive children."

Madam Vile throws a few nanoprobes at the Marvelous 4. The nanoprobes take some blood from each of the Marvelous 4.

"Argh! That stings! I wish I saw that coming!" Mr. Marvel said.

Mr. Marvel then realizes that Madam Vile escaped.

"Drat! She got away!"

"What should we do now Beowulf? You seem to know more about Madam Vile than any of us."

1411322.content:
The Mighty Explorers- They are a team of heroes and explorers who fight crime and explore new lands, planets and dimensions. They are based in Houston, Texas. This team always finds forgotten threats from the past or bizarre threats from the future that most people have turned a blind eye to.

Crusher- His real name is Kenshin Dukes. He's half Japanese and half Anglo American. His father is the notorious supervillain known as the Blob and his mother is the heartless leader of the Yukuza group known as Shimitoro. As a child he was often ignored by his father and mother. One day out of loneliness he discovered the horrible truth about his parents. He accidentally discovered that his mother was an Inhuman mobster who was kidnapping mutates and mutants to extract them of their MGH. He was also disappointed that his father decided to turn back to a life of crime. Yet Kenshin was 13 at the time. Upon discovering this news he decided to runaway from home. While on the run though he bumped into a sumo stable owner named Yoshi Arimara. Upon meeting the retired sumo champ Kenshin broke down into tears. He then told Yoshi of what he discovered about his folks. Fortunately Yoshi decided to take Kenshin into his stable as a student. The training and sumo school education was tough, but thanks to his mutant genes Kenshin was able to grow stronger, faster, and bigger. At age 18 Kenshin was almost bigger than his father, but he was definitely taller than the Blob. He was also the youngest Yokozuna by age 19. On his 22nd birthday Kenshin's Inhuman genes activated upon coming into contact with the Terrigen Mists. His powers include gravity manipulation, projectile deflection, super strength, size manipulation, and a healing factor. Upon turning 25 Kenshin decided to move to the United States to help create a professional sumo wrestling league in hopes of helping the ancient sport get into the Olympics. Ken currently weighs 1,353 lbs. and stands at 7'5".

Red by Day (Red Riding Hood)/ Werewolfess by Night- Her real name is Jacqueline "Jack" Wolfblood. The illegitimate daughter of Jack Russel and her mother Teresa Wolfblood. She currently loves to read romance novels involving werewolves and horror fiction. Six months ago she decided to fight crime as Red Riding Hood by dressing up in the magical hood that her grandmother had made. One night she had a weird dream of her step-father Greggor Wolfblood running an illegal trade of magical items and other stuff. Ironically that was when her werewolf powers first emerged. During that night Jack attacked her step-father's henchmen and bit her step-father on the arm. Her werewolf side would have killed Greggor, but being a wicked wizard Greggor cast a spell that mimicked real sunlight. The spell caused Jack to revert back to human form. Yet Jack was unconscious since it was her first time turning into a werewolf. Upon waking up the next day she was horrified to see her mouth covered with blood. She quickly showered and decided to head to her grandmother's for the day. After she arrived at her grandmother's house her grandmother was not pleased.

Her grandmother quickly rebuked Jack for not wearing her hood at night since the silver lining inside the hood prevents werewolf transformations. Red was shocked to learn that she was a werewolf. Jack's grandmother then tells her that she was born a werewolf all thanks to her mother having a one night stand with her birth father before he became a werewolf via his family curse. Jack then gulps and realizes that her dream wasn't a dream. By the time she arrived home it was night time and she was wearing her Red Riding Hood costume since she was out fighting crime. Upon coming home she was horrified to see that her mother's heart was ripped out of her chest. She knew her step-father was abusive, but this was too far. In a fit of rage she takes off her hood and transforms into Werewolfess by Night. After that night Jacqueline swore to stop her evil step-father and those like him. 5'8" 125 lbs. Human form. 6'1" 175 lbs. Werewolf form.

Hexitope- A homunculus of unverified age. Through the years of his eternal existence he has learned witchcraft and alchemy, the art of science and magic that created him. From time to time he has flashes of a previous life, but now he lives in loneliness. He is neither alive nor dead since he was created from his own remains. Never aging he ponders if he was once a real human instead of the mockery brought forth through alchemy. Despite his seeming nonexistence as a human he has thrived in the modern world in complete secrecy and seclusion. His seclusion was recently disrupted when Mr. Marvel and his friends had to stop the evil Nightingale, a woman who was a homunculus like himself. Being without a name he called himself Hector Hexitope, master warlock and alchemist. Besides witchcraft and alchemy, Hexitope is a master of various forms of martial arts and possesses the healing factor that many of his kind are known for. He's half Persian and half Italian. Hector Hexitope stands at 6'3" and weighs 250 lbs. of pure muscle.

Miraclewoman- An African American woman known as Hazel Luv. As a little girl she grew up in poverty and was the victim of both racism and sexism. At age 3 her father was killed right before her eyes. At age 15 her mother abandoned Hazel so she could find a man in a club. Life was pretty rough until she met a mysterious man. The man was a pastor who was doing missionary work with his wife and congregation. Upon seeing her on the street the pastor and the congregation wept for her. Before she knew it she was adopted by the church as one of their own. At age 18 she gave her life to Christ and became a Christian. From then on she devoted herself to showing others the love of God that that Pastor Drake and his congregation have shown her. One day as she was heading to the store she saw a figure cloaked in a wonderous light. Upon approaching the angel she was blessed with spiritual powers. She now fights crime and helps the unfortunate as Miraclewoman.

1511.content:
Aaron was a man with a singular mission: to eat women that posed a threat to the universe. He had the unique ability to tell when women were on the verge of becoming universe-eating gluttons, and consume them before they became a significant threat. He was a member of an elite group of woman-eaters who could swallow digest even a woman who had eaten a few universes.

Aaron had scarfed one of those once. She had been delicious, her tremendous rolls of fat the most delicious thing he had ever eaten.

He had also heard of traitors in his organization, ones who impregnated the gluttons so that they became hungrier faster. It was tempting...

The handsome, brown-haired young man with the ice blue eyes loved his job. But how did he do it?
1511.title: Story 1

choices: The universe eater: Callie Briggs from SWAT Kats
The cast clearout: the women of the Sly Cooper series
15111.content:
Out there in the multiverse there are worlds where the female characters from games, anime, cartoons, and the like become fat. They succumb to greedy desire, and start piling on the pounds. And in some worlds, their desires become destructive, their need for food and more fat on their bodies reaching universe-ending potential. Sometimes they got to them in time, but sometimes they had to get them after they had eaten a few universes.

Which was fine with Aaron. He loved to swallow up these fat beauties and feel them digest inside his belly. He usually got incredibly fat for a while, but the same abilities that allowed him to swallow such gluttons made it so that his metabolism slimmed him down in short order. For him, that meant he could stuff himself on gluttons as much as he liked.

It was a quiet day at the office. There hadn't been any calls lately, so Aaron was content to just relax the day away, reading a book. It was a favorite book, one featuring a man collecting a harem of fat beauties that he intended to breed and eat. As he read, though one of his workmates came up to him with a file in her hand.

"Got a new job for you, stud," she said, the buxom redhead openly flirting with him.

Aaron grinned. "Excellent," he said. "I was getting in the mood for some delicious fatty."

The redhead grinned and placed the file on his lap. "Got a couple cases for you today," she said. "One's a universe eater who's already packed away a few, the other is a full cast fatty clearout."

"Nice," Aaron said, looking at the files, and making his decision on who to go after first.
15111.title: Eat them while they're fat

15112.content:
"The key, you see, is catching them before they get too gluttonous," Aaron had been known to say. "Oh, certainly swallowing a fatty whole is delightful, and gulping down a universe-filled fatty is delicious, but the best meat comes before they turn gluttonous. Cooked and served up on a plate."

Aaron was the kind of guy who liked to sit down to an excellent meal of female flesh, roasted and served up for him on a platter. Bite after bite of female flesh... simply delicious, and truly satisfying for his greedy belly.

Sitting in his office, he calmly tapped away at a video game, a custom title where the characters could all eat each other, each selectable character a woman he had eaten in the past. As he relaxed, the officer who assigned targets came in with a file.

"Got a new one for you," she said, tossing the file on his. "This one has the whole female cast at risk of becoming a universe eater."

Aaron blinked. "A multi-course meal? Nice," he said.

The officer smiled. "This one you'll like. They WANT you to Dolcett them. Reports indicate that they'll be particularly destructive ones. So you have authorization to have fun with them and humiliate them first. You'll be given a power adaptor as you enter that reality."

Aaron llicked his lips. "Exquisite," he said. "I love it when I get a big meal with variety." He picked up the file and looked at which world he was going to.
15112.title: Eat them Dolcett-style while they're skinny

15113.content:
Aaron was indeed familiar with the traitors in the organization. Scoundrels who loved to impregnate the fatties, making them even hungrier just so they'd get fatter faster, helping them escape notice until the knocked up gluttons had consumed several universes, becoming properly juicy enough to be truly satisfying when eaten.

Yes, he knew them well.

He was one of them.

And he used his position within the ranks of the World-Eater Eaters to find gluttons on the verge of becoming world-eaters and give them that last little... push.

Even now, he was looking through the database on his private computer, hacked into via his allies. He licked his lips, looking at all the fat, beautiful women out there, all on the verge of becoming cannibalistically carnivorous, and then apocalyptically omnivorous.

His eyes finally settled on one, a grin coming to his face as he admired her many rolls of fat...

2.) Breeding Sluts of Azeroth - Garrosh Hellscream and King Varian Wrynn, to EVERYONE'S surprise, call a truce. The reason? 1512.title: Adventures In Azeroth

choices: Stick with the four Argent Dawn members...
Watch the bartender prepare the meals...
15123.content:
So a human paladin, night elf druid, orc shaman, and undead warlock walk into a neutral tavern. Not an unusual sight... if there was a crisis involved. Say, the Lich King or Deathwing. But no, this was merely an investigation. And to everyone's surprise, it was one sanctioned by both Varian Wrynn and Garrosh Hellscream, two people who couldn't spend more than one minute in a room without trying to kill each other. They had ordered cooperation between the Alliance and the Horde to try and investigate two things.

One of them was the recent weight gain in several adventurers. That was an easy one. As the four who just walked into the bar could attest, the reason everyone was gaining weight is because of the new meat provider, Grendazig's Exotic Carnivore Delights, that was making waves in both factions. All of this company's meat products were insanely delicious, and people just couldn't get enough. They worked in conjunction with a fur seller, who's coats and cloths were becoming famous all across Azeroth.

The other... that was the strange thing. Female adventurers were disappearing all over Azeroth. Humans, dwarves, night elves, gnomes, draenei, worgen, orcs, tauren, Forsaken, trolls, blood elves, goblins, pandaren, and females of other races all vanished daily. There was no trace, no sign of any of what happened to them. They were just... gone. Never anyone important, but always there were women disappearing. It was baffling.

Certainly the four who were entering the bar thought so. They were members of the Argent Dawn and no longer a part of the stupid feud between Varian and Garrosh, but were glad for the cooperation. After a long day of investigating, they were tired and just wanted to rest and enjoy a good, hot meal. And fortunately for them, the tavern served Grendazig meats.

The barkeeper, a plump troll with a perpetually grumpy expression, looked them over. All of them were wearing good armor, with the heavy shoulder pads that indicated high level gear. They all sported vast, fat bodies that bulged out of their armor in places, especially around their bellies. The two females of the group, the night elf and orc, sported fat, bloated breasts that threatened to spill out of their tops, shapely despite their vast stomachs and huge asses. Indeed, they were fatter even than their male companions. They chatted amiably, waiting patiently for him to come to them.

The troll barkeeper stared at the women for a long moment before shaking his head, deciding against something. He went over to them, his grumpy expression changing to a friendlier one as he greeted them. "How can I help you?"

"Greetings to you sir," the human said, smiling and stroking his beard idly. "We'd like four Grendazig specials apiece, please."

"Extra fried tentacles for me," the orc said.

"And I think I'd like to try that zombie burger..." the night elf said.

The other three stared at her. "You sure, Callista?" the undead asked, worried for his friend.

"I'm sure, Marcus," the night elf said, smiling. "Ever since the Grendazig company learned how to make undead meat edible and plague free, I've actually been wanting to try it. It's dangerous to leave zombie cows roaming anyway."

"Couldn't agree more," the barkeep said as he went to prepare the meals. The fact that the number of female undead adventurers had gone up shortly after this escaped the adventurers completely. Just as planned.

151311.content:
((Switching to third person because I kept forgetting to write in second person while making this post))

Aaron rubbed the lamp cautiously. He thought to himself that it couldn't really be a genie lamp, that genies just existed in stories... but it never hurt to try, right?

After a few rubs, nothing seemed to happen. He nodded, and started to put the lamp down, when a massive jet of colorful steam shot out. Aaron dropped the lamp, falling on his ass and backing away fearfully as the smoke took shape, turning into a handsome, white-haired Arab man in what looked like a blue version of Aladdin's Prince Ali outfit, for lack of a better reference in Aaron's mind. Looking at his face, Aaron was reminded of another Disney character, as the shape of the genie's face reminded Aaron of an Arab version of Puck from Gargoyles.

The genie looked around, spotting Aaron and kneeling. "You have released me, my master. As per the laws of genie-kind, I am yours to command until you decide to release me from your service by giving my lamp to another."

Aaron looked at the genie and gulped nervously. "So... So I get three wishes, right?"

The genie looked offended. "Djinn give three. And they usually try to screw over the person who makes the wishes by 'creative interpretation.' I am a genie, and we give unlimited wishes, including undos. And even if the lamp is taken, I only grant wishes to you unless you willingly give me up," he said.

Aaron looked around, and noticed people staring, a policeman starting to come over to the two of them. "Then I wish you'd tone it down a little... I don't want people knowing about you..."

The genie nodded, and snapped his fingers. Everyone went back to what they were doing, forgetting about the genie's sudden appearance. The genie's clothes changed, becoming a casual blue t-shirt and loose-fitting black jeans, a pair of black sneakers on his feet. He smiled, and picked up the lamp, handing it to Aaron.

"There you are," the genie said, "Now no one will notice me no matter what I do." To prove it, he turned into a giant blue cobra. No one batted an eye, going about their business as if nothing happened.

"Wow..." Aaron said softly. "Do... Do you have a name?"

The genie smiled, turning back to human form. He had a feeling this would be a good master. Most never even asked his name. "Indeed. I am Fen'Faral," he said. "It is an honor, my master."

Aaron nodded, a grin starting to form on his face as his brain started to process the fact that he had a genie...

154.content:
Mary Lou Walker was a sexual deviant in her day, not only embracing the title, but she seemed proud of. Needless to say any community she lived in wasn't a fan of her. Her own son Walter hated the woman, she had wrecked a number of his friendships with local boys because she would seduce them. A rumor had followed the woman however, that she was caught having sexual relations with an inmate at North View Asylum upstate, and it also wrecked Walter's life when people found out. So when he turned 18, he went for answers and before long found himself sitting infront of this...thing: All of him seemed white, from his dressing to his pale skin and long hands that figdeted with eachother. Even his short hair seemed to be the lightest blonde it clould be. Though color was added to the hunched over thing, as everytime he'd glance up you could see dark circles around his eyes and when he muttered to himself, you could see his teeth were a mix of yellow and brown shades. Walter was almost speechless. Here was the man said to be his father, Linsday Wiaters, and he seemed more like a helpless child than an adult, his skin didn't even wrinkle.
"The doctor will be with you shortly," the nurse said as she started to leave the visiting room.
For a long while Walter felt alone in that room as he just watched the man sitting on the bed of a windowless visiting room, yet he kept looking at the wall as if expecting one as he rocked.
Finally, someone spoke. The voice was a little high and unused, but out from the fidgeting man came a "hi-hello-hi." Very quick and short,it caught Walter off guard for a second.
"Uh, hello? Do you know who I am?"
"Good - how are you?"
"Oh...im okay.." he said a little confused as a young doctor, about 25 entered the room.
"I wouldn't waste your time. He just repeats things he hears. Isn't that right Mr.Wiaters?"
"Right, Mr.Wiaters....right.."
"See?"
"So you're the doctor?" Walter asked "And he's really my father?"
"Oh....all of that..mess, happened before I was here but given how it upset Dr.Blumer before me, he took care of the children brought here before recently, and how blonde women send him into a screaming fit- I'd say so."
"Wait children?"
"Yes until these new laws we often got children who were slow or what have you. And Mr.wiaters, according to his file, came here at nine from a county hospital after police found him on the roadside, probably abandoned." The doctor shrugged, despite laws trying to change It still happened a lot.
"And how old his now?"
"Roughly 31-32." The doctor said simply, Walters father basiclly spent his whole life here and Walter wanted to change that.

1543.content:
The estate loomed over town, a large stone beast that's gray bricks and, unattended garden glared down on everything. On this night, the fire places burned to keep the place warm. The master bedroom, was connected to a study that connected his room to a second bedroom. The Master himself was one Albert Bentoview, who rarely left his home in some time at age 65. As far as he knew the world outside had changed little since the days he would venture into town. He was consumed with his work. It took 20 years in his lab, but his hard work had paid off.
His work, stood at nearly 6'0, 102 pounds, wearing a silk and velvet boys suit of old. He was broad-shouldered, with dark hair cut into a line that ended just before his blue eyes, with a stoic, blank look on his face. Master Albert, called his 'son', 'Jody' while the servants called him "little" monster, and Jody himself, being just two weeks, had no care for what he was called. Jody's creator-father reasoned, that no matter the size to raise him into a gentlemen, he first had to raise a proper boy. As such his room was furnished properly with books, toys, Mother Goose figures on the wall. This was the second bedroom the study connected his room too. Where the pair sat at the moment on the sofa, before the fire place and a stack of books to educate by. At the moment Master Albert sat reading from a book on etiquette for boys, marked 1902. Keeping Jody close as he read, dropping his voice to a loving cooing tone on some lines.
The old man looked up from he book, seeing the stoic face. "Yes, I agree, this is a bit boring- how about something more fun?" He chuckled setting the book aside to find some poetry books. Jody stood, grabbing his porcelain clown doll, and lumbered over to the window to look. He'd be called back soon but the service elevator was coming up and out step Charles with a normal nightly tray of tea, he started to serve the master. But was slow to ask "and will, uh, ...it be having some too, sir? Or the usual milk?" He uneasily nodded towards Jody by the window.

Here you can write whatever you want. It can be fetish, fanfic, anything you want. If you want to put Gay/Lesbian stuff, feel free! If you wanna make a story of a fetish(example: Weight Gain, Inflation, Giant/Giantess, etc.) mixed with a fanfic, by all means do it! The best part? You can make as many stories as you want. There are a few rules though.
Rule 1: Before you start a story, add an option, or as many options as possible, to make a new story,(e.g. option 1: Start the story, option 2: make a new story) If there are no choices like that, I will delete the chapter, or add an option for "make a new story"
Rule 2: No adding to someone else's story, unless the author allows it.
Rule 3: Please use "spellcheck"
Other than that, go nuts.
